greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence which records for primes their residue modulo 4, and for all other numbers assigns a unique number.
comment: Restricted growth sequence transform of function f defined as f(n) = A010873(n) when n is a prime, otherwise -n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 26 2018
